sub_title: Co-owner and senior consultant at Adviesbureau E.C.O. Logisch
summary:
As an ecologist, my aim is to (re)connect people with wildlife. In my job as an ecological consultant, I do the best I can to make sure wildlife, construction and landscaping can go hand in hand, whilst making sure Dutch law and legislation is complied with. Also I spend some of my working hours on lecturing about wildlife (surveying, law and legislation, population management) and supervising interns.

Since 2009 I am involved in scientific research by Dr. Claire Spottiswoode on brood parasites in Zambia. Aside from the research, I have been the scientific advisor for parts in three natural history documentaries, once on the African Cuckoo and twice on the Greater Honeyguide.

In my spare time, I am actively involved in wildlife management. As chairman of Wildbeheereenheid Delfland, an association of hunters in the area roughly between The Hague and Rotterdam, my goal is to improve collaboration between conservationists and hunters in order to improve biodiversity by working together.  

Specialties: 
Consultance regarding wildlife in relation to construction and landscaping
Surveying reptiles, amphibians, fish, birds, mammals
Wildlife management

projects.title: Efficiënter vossenbeheer ten gunste van weidevogels
projects.description:
Opstellen van een projectplan en aanvragen van ontheffing om bij het beheren van de vos in het werkgebied van Wildbeheereenheid Delfland gebruik te mogen maken van kunstmatige lichtbronnen en voor gebruik van geweer tussen zonsondergang en zonsopkomst. 

Uitgangspunt bij het aanvragen van de ontheffing is het terugbrengen van de vossenpopulatie voor aanvang van het broedseizoen. In het broedseizoen wordt alleen in overleg met Vogelwerkgroep Midden-Delfland gebruik gemaakt van de ontheffing op locaties waar dit noodzakelijk geacht wordt.

Onderbouwing van de aanvraag met gegevens van WBE Delfland, ANV Vockestaert en Vogelwerkgroep Midden-Delfland. Deze samenwerking is ontstaan, doordat ANV Vockestaert in de plannen van het Weidevogelpact het onderwerp predatiebeheer toebedeeld heeft gekregen.

Omgevingsdienst Haaglanden heeft de ontheffing met kenmerk ODH-2016-00105936 verleend aan Wildbeheereenheid Delfland. Na een bezwaarprocedure is deze gehandhaafd en vanaf december 2016 zijn vrijwilligers van WBE Deflland gestart met de uitvoering van het aangepaste vossenbeheer.

profile_positions.description:
Conducting surveys on protected species in the Netherlands. Mainly on fish, amphibians, birds, bats, small mammals, reptiles and dragonflies.

Advising construction companies and authorities on how to cope with the presence of protected species without breaking Dutch and European legislation. Monitoring and supervising the construction companies during their projects.

Lecturing on law and legislation concerning Dutch wildlife, surveying methods and population management.

Research assistant of Dr. Claire Spottiswoode (University of Cambridge) at her projects on parasitic birds in Zambia; specifically Greater Honeyguide and African Cuckoo. (http://www.africancuckoos.zoo.cam.ac.uk/index.html)
profile_positions.title: Partner & Ecological consultant

profile_positions.description:
Conducting surveys on protected species in the Netherlands. Mainly on fish, amphibians, birds, bats, small mammals, reptiles and dragonflies.

Advising construction companies on how to cope with the presence of protected species without breaking Dutch and European legislation. Monitoring and supervising the construction companies during their projects.
profile_positions.title: Ecological consultant

profile_positions.location: South Africa, Botswana, Namibia, Angola, DRCongo, Congo, Gabon, Cameroon
profile_positions.description:
Research assistant during an expedition from South Africa to Cameroon with R. de Boer MSc and R. Zoer, focussed on collecting data from African Dwarf Crocodile, Nile Crocodile and Slendersnout Crocodile.

Catching crocodiles, taking measurements, DNA samples, blood smears, describe animals.
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

profile_positions.description: Lecturer and developing educational material concerning wildlife management
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Research assistant of Dr. V.R. Jones during her PhD on the relation between Sardinian Warbler (Sylvia melanocephala) and Cyprus Warbler (Sylvia melanothorax) on seven plots in Cyprus.

Observing behaviour, finding nests, netting, ringing and taking blood smears.
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

profile_positions.description:
Internship (thesis) on the knowledge of Cypriot children about the different species of reptiles in their country.

Questionaires, statistics
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Traineeship in co-oporation with Snake Georges Reptile Park on the possibilities and threats for two populations of Cyprus Grass Snake in Cyprus.

Observing reptile and human activities in the habitat of the Cyprus Grass Snake, Natrix natrix cypriaca.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description: Behavioural study on interaction between parrots and zoo visitors in an enclosure open to public during the breeding season.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

volunteer_experiences.description: Surveying / monitoring reptiles, amphibians and fish
Monitoring breeding birds in the dunes
Auditing financial administration for the Dutch Herpetological Society Lacerta

Secretary - chairman. 
Organising lectures, exhibitions and edit the club journal
Educating visitors about the reptiles and amphibians locally found in Cyprus and supervising Dutch interns.

Bestuurslid van een regionale vereniging van jagers, grondgebruikers en anders in jacht en faunabeheer geïnteresseerden.

Naast voorzitten van het dagelijks bestuur, onder andere actief in overleggen aangaande weidevogelbescherming en het geven van voorlichting.
Als vertegenwoordiger van de wildbeheereenheden in Zuid-Holland lid van de ledenraad. Tevens bestuurslid van de afdeling Zuid-Holland van de Jagersvereniging.
